title: Semi serif
content:
I'm looking for semi-serif's. can anyone recommend some?

Thank you
author: jonathanlawley

comments.content:
You may have already thought of 'Rotis' and 'TheMix' / 'Thesis'.? _( The 'standard', classic suggestions for 'Semi Serif'.. :)_

What about ' [Keule](http://web.archive.org/web/20141201055630/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1129&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=EFT0000231)', by Hubert Jocham, or, ' [Sovereign](http://web.archive.org/web/20141201055630/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1129&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=GTT0000019)', by Nick Cooke.?

Dav

I am really liking Storm's [Areplos](http://web.archive.org/web/20141201055630/http:/www.stormtype.com/areplos.html).

ChrisL

Funny, _I_ ususally recommend Storm faces, but today MyFonts' font of the day fits the bill: [Cicero](http://web.archive.org/web/20141201055630/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/presencetypo/cicero/) by [Présence Typo](http://web.archive.org/web/20141201055630/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Presence%20Typo). I was checking out their library, and IMO it's right up there in quality with Storm. Great stuff!  
I think [Laricio](http://web.archive.org/web/20141201055630/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/presencetypo/laricio/) also fits in your semi-serif search.
